entry.title: $2400 // Impeccably designed - the generous â–º marble countertops
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 21796


2 Bed / 1 Bath in PLG: Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Winthrop St. This gut renovated rental building features high end finishes paired with spacious layouts. Impeccably designed - the generous marble countertops, convenient washer/dryer in unit & high end dishwasher. Large sun-kissed layouts in this thoughtful four unit building. Situated in the best of historic and re-emerging Prospect Lefferts Gardens, which includes lovely tree lined streets, beautiful original brownstones, fine eateries, wine bars and supermarkets. Convenient to everything.

AMENITIES
High Ceilings
Natural Light in Living Area
Washer dryer installed
Private backyard
Outdoor Space
Patio
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Built in microwave
Stone countertops
